<p><figure><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/e6b9796e0425d604ccf4dd4df2733721/tumblr_inline_nk1fr2aXme1rr2wit.jpg" alt="image"/></figure><iframe src="http://www.twitch.tv/lokenplays/embed" frameborder="0" scrolling="no" height="300" width="480"></iframe></p>

<p>LokenPlays has recently picked up streaming KSP. This British streamer is shooting for Twitch partnership, and we’re happy to highlight his stream. </p>

<p>Watch directly from the video or follow the link to join his chat: </p>

<p><a href="http://goo.gl/8sSE5J">http://goo.gl/8sSE5J</a></p>
